A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Something very strange is going on here. 92%? The alt-right? Some have even been saying that the movie is alright\, it's just that as a Star Wars movie it's trash. I think the opposite case could be made\, in that as fans we can forgive quite a lot-such as the obvious\, WTF-type missteps is TFA. I have friends that bend over backwards to defend all sorts of Star Wars ridiculousness. I've been disappointed but have remained hopeful\, but no more. In the face of this kind of incompetence and plain lack of common sense on practically every level\, what's to do? Bye Star Wars! RIP
